title: Braum is broken cancer.
body:
No reason why he should do more damage early game than the enemy ADC. Not to mention that bug that allows ADC's to proc his passive with a stack with an auto, even when no stack was on you and that damn wall.

Broken champ.

replies.body: Check his runes. Might've had ap runes. Early game, braum should have a difficult time hitting your adc anyway. Stand behind the minion waves. OH SHIT I FORGOT THAT THERE WERE MINION WAVES

Cancer is bad.

But if it was broken, wouldn't it's potency be reduced?

Thus making regular cancer worse than broken cancer?
Why don't you send them a ticket saying this, Riot probably won't read it here unless you say a Rioters name or put this in 'Help & Support'.
Ahaha put in in "help and support". Have you seen the help and support section? There's a reply from a Rioter every 20 posts.

It won't be fixed, I just have to use one of my bans to ban the cancer.

Riot will fix bugs on a Champion if they can find the Bug. Give riot a short paragraph about the bug on Braum Riot will then try to recreate this bug and then They'll hopefully fix it. It could just be that Braum's passive is stacking for a couple extra seconds after the effect wheres off.
